overview: Riley is every bit as innocent and sweet as she looks while assuming a submissive role with her lovers. Dani Jensen and Sindee Jennings add a virginal aspect to the film as they eagerly take every inch the guys have to offer. All natural, dark-haired beauty Tori Black receives a pounding from Mick Blue while Riley takes a long ride on Ben Englishs cock to steam up the final scenes.
tagline: Lost in a game of love, she finds her true passion
title: Riley Steele: Love Fool
